Text.Page:
There's a problem on the road to Lee's End Stead. Hyenas have been stalking the path between farms, killing livestock and attacking merchants.

, could you take care of the beasts for us? Lee's End Stead is east of here.

When you're done hunting the hyenas, please report to Cregan; you'll find him out on the road.
Are you <PCNAME>? I'm assuming you've hunted a horde of those hyenas, and now you're after the reward?
